name: New Gmail Compact Dark
description: Give more space to read incoming mail Features: Inbox mails takes only one line, Change the colors of selected/on mouse over/new mail. Change the + icon color in the left Sidebar. Change the background color and police color of the left Sidebar. Minimize the space taken at the top by the GMail icon and others. Delete the background of the account icon. Deleted the right sidebar in order to have more place for reading mails. You must choose a dark theme for a better effect and the dark text background mode (Settings Icon > Themes > A > Dark > Save)
additional_info: 1.2.2- 08.01.19 Minor adaptations of the code to reflect the CSS changes made by Google/Gmail 1.2.1- 17.12.18 Minor adaptations of the code to reflect the CSS changes made by Google/Gmail 1.2- 10.12.18 Multiple adaptations of the code to reflect the CSS changes made by Google/Gmail 1.11- 31.05.18 - Changed height of caracters in the Search Field for better visibility 1.1- 30.05.18 - Right sidebar deleted (Agenda, Keep and Tasks can still be acessed through the Google Application menu [the square on top of the window] - Height of the search bar drastically diminished. 1.0- 15.05.18 - Inbox mail subjects reduced to only one line - Inbox colors and on mouse over mail/new mail changed for better contrast - The "+" icon on the left bar is more colourfull and the background set to grey (instead of red) - The left sidebar background colour is set to dark blue - The left sidebar police colours are changed for better contrast - On top, diminished the space taken by the Gmail icon - On top right, delete the whitish background of the account icon This Style is based on "new Gmail Single Line and Colours", by Recognizer. Thanx to him Change background color of the upper right account icon is taken from "Gmail 2018 rebirth", thanx to mitchm My CSS habilities are very bad. Feel free to propose better implementation of the code!
